QuestData.Title: Take it to 'Em!
QuestData.Description: We was lucky to escape, $c. I'm not sure I'd feel right if we didn't take care of them ambushers.$b$bHows about you git back up to Khartut's tomb and give them little buggers what fer!$b$bIt's off to the northeast, just inside the entrance to Uldum if'n I recollect correctly.$b$bWhat're you looking at? I sure ain't in no condition to do it!
QuestData.LogDescription: Mack wants you to investigate Khartut's Tomb.
QuestData.RewardText: Good to see ya, kid.$b$bWould've been even better if you'd have been here to help me take care of these little savages...
